short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides dictionaries for spelling, thesaurus, and hyphenation for the venetan language (ISO 639-3 vec).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Venetan dictionary and spell checking (using the spelling of Mauro Trevisan): this serves the purpose of verifying correct writing in the Venetan language
